name: Photo Tour Montreal
description:
Hi there fel­low pho­tog­ra­pher! Thanks so much for click­ing this page to find out more about my Mon­treal pho­tog­ra­phy tour and Mon­treal photo courses. If you’ve stum­bled on this page as your entry page to the site, Wel­come! My name is Marko Kulik and I’m the one that per­son­ally offers all the tours or courses.

If you’d like to spend the day pho­tograph­ing the inter­est­ing parts of Mon­treal by car or on foot with an expe­ri­enced Mon­treal pho­tog­ra­pher, it would be my plea­sure to be your pri­vate Mon­treal photo tour guide.

If you’d like to under­stand your cam­era bet­ter so that you can take your pho­tog­ra­phy to the next level, it would be my plea­sure to help get you to there in just a few hours.
